content: kimberly k mcalindin www mybuttonjar blogspot com sherbet wrap materials size k crochet hook 3 skeins alchemy silken straw   using the foundation single_crochet method fsc work 49 fsc row 1 ch1 turn double_crochet in first fsc * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next fsc skip 1 fsc repeat from * across to last fsc double_crochet in last fsc row 2 ch1 turn double_crochet in first double_crochet * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next ch1 space repeat from * across double_crochet in last double_crochet continue with row 2 for wrap changing colors when needed ©2009 kimberly k mcalindin all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only please do not copy distribute or sell products made from this pattern
